name: Get Values
func:
let msg1 = {};
let msg2 = {};
let msg3 = {};
let msg4 = {};
let msg5 = {};
let msg6 = {};

node.warn(msg)

msg1.topic = "temperature"
msg1.payload = msg.out.T
msg1.device = msg.device

msg2.topic = "humidity"
msg2.payload = msg.out.H
msg2.device = msg.device

msg3.topic = "Humidity Soil"
msg3.payload = msg.out.S
msg3.device = msg.device

msg4.topic = "Pressure"
msg4.payload = msg.out.P
msg4.device = msg.device

msg5.topic = "UV"
msg5.payload = msg.out.U
msg5.device = msg.device

node.send([msg1, msg2, msg3, msg4, msg5, null])

name: Device Identification
func:
/*
    0: L0
    1: L1
    2: L4
    */


var Devices = ["AAC44AC5", "AAABB14A", "AAC44AC6"]

addr = msg.DevAddr

//node.warn(addr)

switch(Devices.indexOf(addr))
{
    case 0:
        msg.topic = "L0 Board"
        node.send([msg, null, null, null, null])
    break;
    case 1:
        msg.topic = "L1 Board"
        node.send([null, msg, null, null, null])
    break;
    case 2:
        msg.topic = "L4 Board"
        node.send([null, null, msg, null, null])
    break;
    case 3:
        msg.topic = "xx Board"
        node.send([null, null, null, msg, null])
    break;
    case 4:
        msg.topic = "xx Board"
        node.send([null, null, null, null ,msg])
    break;
}
